actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to exclude from certain job preference programs veterans who deserted from the Armed Forces during the Vietnam era and who are awarded other than dishonorable discharges under the Presidential clemency program.

summary.text: Provides for the exclusion from job preference programs of those veterans who deserted from the Armed Forces during the Vietnam era and who are awarded other than dishonorable discharges under the Presidential clemency program.

titles.title: A bill to exclude from certain job preference programs veterans who deserted from the Armed Forces during the Vietnam era and who are awarded other than dishonorable discharges under the Presidential clemency program.
